p: To further investigate its phylogenetic position, Cupressus gigantea was used as the outgroup, the phylogenetic analysis of 36 plastid genomes from published species of Lauraceae were analyzed using MEGA7.0 (with 1,000 bootstrap replicates) (Kumar etÂ al. 2016). The result indicated that L. molis is more closely related to species of Lindera genus than other genera in Lauraceae ( Figure 1).
